page.title: 19Castle & Sugary Coves.
page.content: Castle Cove is a very interesting beach when it is high tide.It is best to go swimming from the beach when it is high tide because it is not so rocky .A lot of people go to Castle Cove because of the view of the river mouth or to fish from the rocks.People catch mackerel,bass,wrass and pollock. The cove is a very pleasant beach for an evening walk or an evening swim. The steps you walk down are steep but safe.There is a platform aWhen it is low tide there is lots of seaweed and rocks.But when it is high tide there is hardly any beach and it is very stoney.At the top of the steps there is a shop that is open all day.Also there is a carpark by the shop,you can park there any time without paying .There is a grassy slope which leads up to the castle.
